price: Ampa sε εno ne nokorε. Egya no mu foͻ no reko.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
